channel.title: Highscores help
channel.description:
Ok so i'm having trouble making my highscores, i've already portforwarded it, and everything like that all though i'm having some mysql problems, and when the players don't save when they log out, i'm really looking for help! please help me.
i got the whole high-scores working, but the players don't save! thats all
